name: Grand Arms: March of the Red Dragon DEMO
name_original: Grand Arms: March of the Red Dragon DEMO
description:
Grand Arms: March of the Red Dragon is a squad-based tactical RPG, with auto turn-based combat and real-time-with-pause map movement. Build your army, conquer cities and castles, and unite Wales under a single Prince in the face of an English invasion. Inspired by classic JRPGs including Ogre Battle and Ogre Battle 64.

The full game is coming to Steam in Q4 2023.

This demo includes the first three missions with the surrounding story content to give you a taste of the core gameplay and setting. We would love your feedback: the best place to reach the developer is on Discord.

If you like the game, wishlist on Steam to be notified when it's released. Wishlists are a great way to support the development as they help gain visibility in the Steam store.

Thanks for playing!

How to play

The game takes a few seconds to load, but should start automatically.

  • The game can be played entirely with your mouse.
  • During a mission,
    • Click on units to select them, and right click to move.
    • Page Up/Page Down to tilt the camera
    • + and - to zoom in/out
    • Arrow keys to pan the map.
    • Enter to pause/unpause. The game also pauses when a unit is selected, or you can click on the sun/moon icon.
  • For more info, press the question mark button to bring up the help pages - there's a lot of useful advice about how the game works, who characters are, etc.
